name: luda
description: A responsive and lightweight UI framework for modern web development

scripts.dev-init: echo +++ Checking node... && node -v && echo +++ Checking npm... && npm -v && echo +++ Checking yarn... && yarn -v && echo +++ Checking ruby... && ruby -v && echo +++ Checking gem... && gem -v && echo +++ Checking bundler... && bundle -v && echo +++ Checking zip... && zip -v && yarn install && bundle install && echo +++ Login gem... && gem signin && echo +++ Login npm && npm login && echo +++ Development enviroument checked and inited successfully.
scripts.css-compile: cross-conf-env npm run css-banner --luda:theme=npm_package_config_theme && cross-conf-env sass src/sass/npm_package_config_theme/index.sass dist/css/luda-npm_package_config_theme.css --embed-sources --precision npm_package_config_sassPrecision
scripts.js-build: npm-run-all --sequential js-compile degradation-js-compile js-minify degradation-js-minify js-modules-compile
scripts.gem-luda-copy: shx cp -rf src/sass/. gem/assets/stylesheets/luda/ && shx cp -rf src/js/. gem/assets/javascripts/luda/ && shx cp -rf dist/js/. gem/assets/javascripts/
scripts.gem-package: cd gem && cross-conf-env gem build luda.gemspec && cross-conf-env shx mv luda-npm_package_version.gem ../release/gem/luda-npm_package_version.gem
scripts.site-page-build: npm run site-luda-copy && cross-conf-env cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production jekyll build --config "build/site.jekyll.config.yml,build/site.jekyll.config.data.yml" --destination release/site/npm_package_config_siteVersion --baseurl /npm_package_config_siteVersion
scripts.serve-dev: cross-conf-env cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=npm_package_config_theme bundle exec jekyll serve --config build/jekyll.config.yml --port npm_package_config_port --livereload
scripts.serve-test: cross-conf-env cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=npm_package_config_theme-test bundle exec jekyll serve --config build/jekyll.config.yml --port npm_package_config_port
scripts.serve-site: npm-run-all --parallel site-luda-copy site-page-data && cross-conf-env bundle exec jekyll serve --config "build/site.jekyll.config.yml,build/site.jekyll.config.data.yml" --port npm_package_config_port --destination .tmp/site/npm_package_config_siteVersion --livereload
scripts.test-reference: cross-conf-env shx rm -rf test/screenshots/npm_package_config_theme && cross-conf-env cross-env LUDA_TEST_ENV=reference npm run test --luda:theme=npm_package_config_theme
scripts.test: npm-run-all --parallel lint-test-coffee test-js-compile lint-html build --parallel serve-test test-run
scripts.dev: npm-run-all --parallel lint-sass lint-coffee lint-html css-compile js-compile degradation-js-compile --parallel watch-sass watch-coffee watch-html watch-degradation-coffee serve-dev
scripts.site: npm-run-all --parallel lint-site-sass lint-site-coffee lint-site-html site-css-compile site-js-compile --parallel watch-site-sass watch-site-coffee watch-site-html serve-site
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf .tmp test/screenshots local.log yarn-error.log npm-debug.log && shx echo +++ Luda cleaned!
scripts.build-dist: cd release && cd dist && cross-conf-env shx rm -rf luda-npm_package_version && cross-conf-env mkdir luda-npm_package_version && cross-conf-env shx cp -rf ../../dist/. luda-npm_package_version/ && cross-conf-env zip -r9 luda-npm_package_version.zip luda-npm_package_version && cross-conf-env shx rm -rf luda-npm_package_version
scripts.build-npm: npm pack && cross-conf-env shx mv luda-npm_package_version.tgz release/npm/luda-npm_package_version.tgz
scripts.build-site: npm-run-all --parallel lint-site-sass lint-site-coffee lint-site-html site-css-build site-js-build --sequential site-page-data site-page-build site-root-build
scripts.push-site: git add -A && cross-conf-env git commit -am "Release site vnpm_package_config_siteVersion" && git subtree push --prefix=release/site origin gh-pages && echo +++ Site has been pushed to gh-pages branch. You need manually push current branch if necessary.
scripts.archive: git add -A && cross-conf-env git commit -am "Release vnpm_package_version." && cross-conf-env git tag -a vnpm_package_version -m "Release vnpm_package_version." && cross-conf-env git push origin vnpm_package_version && cross-conf-env echo +++ vnpm_package_version has been pushed as a tag branch. You need push current branch manually if necessary.
scripts.publish: npm-run-all --sequential build build-dist build-npm build-gem push-npm push-gem archive
